creditline: Gift of Mrs. Charles C. Bovey, 1924
provenance: Sarah Bernhardt, Paris (until d. 1923; her sale, part 2, Hôtel Drouot, Paris, July 23, 1923, part of 27 albums in no. 723). [Weyhe Gallery, New York, until 1924; sold 27 albums, for $600, to Bovey for MIA]; Mrs. Charles C. Bovey, Minneapolis (1924; gave 27 albums to MIA)
title: Le Chevalier des Adrets est l'amant d'une femme du monde, il est aimable, ........ (Robert Macaire), from Le Charivari
